text: Mazima Katonda yakkiriza okwenenya kwa Nabbi n'okwa ba Muhajiriina (abaasenguka) n'okwa ba Answar (abaabudamya) abo abaamugoberera mu kiseera ekizibu oluvanyuma lw'okusemberera emitima gya'bamu ku bo okukyuka, olwo nno n'abasonyiwa anti mazima yye bulijjo wa kisa musaasizi era yakkiriza okwenenya
